narrative_prose.investment_thesis_summary: {{company}} ({{ticker}}) trades at ${{price}} ({{price_date}}) with expected return of {{return_wilson_95_pct}}% to Wilson 95% target ${{target_wilson_95}}. Current P/TBV {{current_ptbv}}x represents premium to normalized {{normalized_ptbv}}x, driven by current earnings (ROTE {{rote_ltm_pct}}%) vs through-cycle assumptions (NCO {{through_cycle_nco_bps}} bps).
narrative_prose.rating_rationale: {{rating}} rating reflects {{return_wilson_95_pct}}% expected return within -10% to +15% threshold.

investment_risks.description: CRE {{cre_loans_pct}}% of loans, above peer median ~41%. Office exposure tail risk if values decline 20% = $500M loss vs ${{acl_amount_millions}}M ACL.
Current NCO {{nco_rate_bps}} bps below through-cycle {{through_cycle_nco_bps}} bps. Normalizing provision reduces ROTE from {{rote_ltm_pct}}% to {{normalized_rote_pct}}%.
IB-Only Beta {{deposit_beta_interest_bearing}}, 100 bps Fed cuts → ~50 bps NIM impact. NIB mix {{nib_pct}}% provides limited cushion.
